Class: Coordinator

Coordinator

new Coordinator(nWorkersInputnon-null, workerScriptNamenon-null)

Coordinator for browser-side interface. Coordinates the pool of Workers for computations and message passing.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
nWorkersInput number the number of Workers to spawn in the pool
workerScriptName string the name of the script that the Workers are to execute
Source:
  • mathworkers.js, line 377

Members

ready :boolean

True when all spawned workers have reported that they are ready. False otherwise.
Type:
  • boolean
Source:

Methods

getBuffer() → {Object}

Fetches the object buffer contents. After a message from one or more workers is received, the object buffer is typically populated with data.
Source:
  • mathworkers.js, line 423

Type
Object

getMessageDataList() → {Array}

Fetches the message data list contents. After a message from one or more workers is received, the object buffer is usually populated with data.
